Soil Data Injection with Shiny and PostgreSQL 1 Introduction 1.1 System Requirements

Soil Data Injection with Shiny and PostgreSQL Luis Rodr√≠guez Lado, Eloi Ribeiro, Marcos Angelini 2025-03-12 1 Introduction This document provides a detailed technical manual on setting up a Docker-based PostgreSQL and Shiny application for soil data injection. It covers: Installation and deployment using Docker Database configuration and credentials Data injection workflow from Excel (xlsx) files Explanation of the fill_tables.R script 1.1 System Requirements Docker Desktop installed R and RStudio installed (for local debugging) PostgreSQL with PostGIS extension
